alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 08 at 12:45PM PST until March 10 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THURSDAY TO 1 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. Periods of blowing snow are possible. * WHERE...The Shasta Valley, including Weed, Montague, and portions of Interstate 5 and Highway 97. * WHEN...From 1 PM Thursday to 1 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Lower visibilities are possible due to blowing snow. Loose and unsecured objects may be damaged or lost. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
